title: Ozempic Face 2025: How Celebrities Are Fixing Sunken Cheeks and Sagging Skin
shortdescription: The hottest anti-aging treatments reversing rapid weight-loss damage.
author: Jane Doe

content.content: The Silent Side Effect No One Saw Coming

Ozempic and its cousins turned Hollywood upside down in 2024–2025 — but the gaunt, hollow “Ozempic face” became the new red-carpet nightmare. Now, A-listers are spending tens of thousands to reverse the damage.

Top Beverly Hills dermatologists reveal the exact stack stars are using:
• Sculptra (3–5 vials over 6 months) – $8,000–$15,000
• PRF (Platelet-Rich Fibrin) facials monthly
• Hyper-dilute Radiesse for neck and jawline
• Sofwave or Ultherapy skin-tightening sessions
• Profhilo bioremodeling for hydration
Many finish with strategic fat transfer or nanofat grafting for permanent volume.
One celebrity facialist says, “We’re booking more Ozempic-face rescues than facelifts now.”
